jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Home Health Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Home Health RN is responsible for administering care in the home of patients. Home Health nurses treat a variety of patients, from infants and young mothers to disabled adults and the elderly. Responsibilities of Home Health RNs include monitoring health statistics, giving medication, and providing treatment and palliative care.  1+ year of recent Home Health RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
